item.title: Mapping NHS Vaccine Centres
item.description: The NHS website does not display vaccine centres on a map. How can I know what centres are near me? Answer: scrape the centres and display them all. This does require you to know where you are on a map, but for now, itâ€™s much nicer to visualise. ## Warning: package 'leaflet' was built under R version 4.2.1 ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
